price: Isaan keessa (dubartoota bareeda) ija isaanii (dhirsa isaanii irratti) gabaabsan, kan isaansan dura namniifi jinniin hin tuqintu jira.
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
